p: Fluidized bed drying and coating processes have been well established as scalable means of obtaining coated APIs (e.g., Wurster fluid bed coating) [ 60]. The use of supercritical CO 2 as the fluidizing medium for core particles as well as the drying agent or antisolvent to remove the moisture or solvent respectively from core particles coated with the coating material solution is of great interest, as it allows the coating to be performed in oxygen-free and low-temperature conditions.
